1001.title: Artillery Field Officer
1001.note: An Artillery Field Officer specializing in supporting troops is allocated to your command
1001.note_zh: An Artillery Field Officer specializing in supporting troops is allocated to your command

1002.title: Cargo Truck
1002.note: An Opel Blitz supply truck can ensure a greater return of resources from owned territories.
1002.note_zh: An Opel Blitz supply truck can ensure a greater return of resources from owned territories.

1003.title: Strafing Run
1003.note: The JU-87D will use its two MG-17 machine guns to target enemy infantry and suppress them.
1003.note_zh: The JU-87D will use its two MG-17 machine guns to target enemy infantry and suppress them.

1004.title: Fragmentation Bomb
1004.note: High-explosive fragmentation bombs are dropped on the target location.
1004.note_zh: High-explosive fragmentation bombs are dropped on the target location.

1005.title: Tiger Tank
1005.note: Allows the requisition of the Tiger Heavy Tank to the battlefield.
1005.note_zh: Allows the requisition of the Tiger Heavy Tank to the battlefield.

1006.title: Panzer Tactician
1006.note: All armored vehicles use their equipped smoke dischargers to prevent themselves from being seen.
1006.note_zh: All armored vehicles use their equipped smoke dischargers to prevent themselves from being seen.

1007.title: Tactical Movement
1007.note: All infantry are ordered to move at their fastest available speed for the duration of the ability. Does not affect anti-tank gun squads.
1007.note_zh: All infantry are ordered to move at their fastest available speed for the duration of the ability. Does not affect anti-tank gun squads.

1008.title: Reconnaissance Overflight
1008.note: Available aircraft will make a reconnaissance pass on the targeted location to reveal enemy forces.
1008.note_zh: Available aircraft will make a reconnaissance pass on the targeted location to reveal enemy forces.

1009.title: Command Tank
1009.note: A command tank that improves nearby forces can be deployed to the battlefield.
1009.note_zh: A command tank that improves nearby forces can be deployed to the battlefield.

1010.title: Stuka Close Air Support
1010.note: A Stuka JU-87 will patrol the designated area, targeting enemy units with heavy 37mm cannons.
1010.note_zh: A Stuka JU-87 will patrol the designated area, targeting enemy units with heavy 37mm cannons.

1011.title: Stuka Reconnaissance Pass
1011.note: Available aircraft will make a reconnaissance pass on the targeted location to reveal enemy forces.
1011.note_zh: Available aircraft will make a reconnaissance pass on the targeted location to reveal enemy forces.

1012.title: Supply Drop Zone
1012.note: Cargo planes will fly over a designated Fuel or Munitions point, dropping off resource crates that can be recovered by infantry.
1012.note_zh: Cargo planes will fly over a designated Fuel or Munitions point, dropping off resource crates that can be recovered by infantry.

1013.title: Stuka JU-87D Anti-Infantry Strafe
1013.note: Stuka JU-87D will strafe the target location with its powerful 7.92mm MG 17 machine guns.
1013.note_zh: Stuka JU-87D will strafe the target location with its powerful 7.92mm MG 17 machine guns.

1014.title: Stuka JU-87 Anti-Tank Strafe
1014.note: Stuka JU-87 will strafe the target location with its powerful 37mm cannons.
1014.note_zh: Stuka JU-87 will strafe the target location with its powerful 37mm cannons.

1015.title: Stuka Bombing Strike
1015.note: A JU-87D Stuka will dive in and drop a 50kg bomb on the target location. Capture points are neutralized if hit.
1015.note_zh: A JU-87D Stuka will dive in and drop a 50kg bomb on the target location. Capture points are neutralized if hit.

1016.title: Defensive Fortifications
1016.note: Allows Pioneers to construct Tank Traps.
1016.note_zh: Allows Pioneers to construct Tank Traps.

1017.title: Trench
1017.note: Allows German infantry to dig defensive trenchs.
1017.note_zh: Allows German infantry to dig defensive trenchs.

1018.title: Hull Down
1018.note: Pioneers, Grenadiers and Panzer Grenadiers are able to set German armor in an immobile Hull Down position, increasing defenses and damage.
1018.note_zh: Pioneers, Grenadiers and Panzer Grenadiers are able to set German armor in an immobile Hull Down position, increasing defenses and damage.

1019.title: Pak 43 Emplacement
1019.note: Pioneers and Sturmpioneers are able to construct powerful Pak 43 88mm anti-tank emplacements.
1019.note_zh: Pioneers and Sturmpioneers are able to construct powerful Pak 43 88mm anti-tank emplacements.

1020.title: Sector Artillery
1020.note: Enemy units entering a targeted sector are barraged with 10.5cm artillery.
1020.note_zh: Enemy units entering a targeted sector are barraged with 10.5cm artillery.

1021.title: Model 24 Stun Grenades
1021.note: Grenadiers, Panzer Grenadiers, and Stormtroopers can throw Model 24 stun grenades, which will stun enemy infantry.
1021.note_zh: Grenadiers, Panzer Grenadiers, and Stormtroopers can throw Model 24 stun grenades, which will stun enemy infantry.

1022.title: Jaeger Light Infantry Upgrade
1022.note: Grenadiers, Panzer Grenadiers, and Stormtroopers can be upgraded with this package which adds two G43 rifles and includes training in interrogation.
1022.note_zh: Grenadiers, Panzer Grenadiers, and Stormtroopers can be upgraded with this package which adds two G43 rifles and includes training in interrogation.

1023.title: Stormtrooper
1023.note: Elite infiltration troops who are experts at disrupting enemy supply lines. These units can be deployed from any ambient building.
1023.note_zh: Elite infiltration troops who are experts at disrupting enemy supply lines. These units can be deployed from any ambient building.

1024.title: Tiger Ace
1024.note: High command sends in a legendary Tiger Ace. Only one is available, once deployed fuel income will be reduced by 90% and manpower will be reduced by 25% until the Tiger Ace is destroyed.
1024.note_zh: High command sends in a legendary Tiger Ace. Only one is available, once deployed fuel income will be reduced by 90% and manpower will be reduced by 25% until the Tiger Ace is destroyed.

1025.title: Sprint
1025.note: Allows German infantry to use the Sprint ability. Increaseing movement speed for a short period of time.
1025.note_zh: Allows German infantry to use the Sprint ability. Increaseing movement speed for a short period of time.

1026.title: Break Supply Line
1026.note: Send in a Stuka bomber to neutralize a targeted point with a precision strike, causing the territory to shift into a neutralize state.
1026.note_zh: Send in a Stuka bomber to neutralize a targeted point with a precision strike, causing the territory to shift into a neutralize state.

1027.title: Breakthrough
1027.note: Slightly improves the speed of all vehicle units and allows them to decapture point very rapidly.
1027.note_zh: Slightly improves the speed of all vehicle units and allows them to decapture point very rapidly.

1028.title: Close the Pocket
1028.note: Artillery zeros in on isolated enemy units to destroy them. Automatically attack all cut off enemy territories and frontline territories.
1028.note_zh: Artillery zeros in on isolated enemy units to destroy them. Automatically attack all cut off enemy territories and frontline territories.

1029.title: Railway Artillery Support
1029.note: Off-map railway artillery will fire three large caliber shells at the designated target.
1029.note_zh: Off-map railway artillery will fire three large caliber shells at the designated target.

1030.title: SdKfz 250/7 Mortar Half-track
1030.note: The SdKfz 250/7 Mortar Half-track with its 8cm mortar can provide vital battlefield support for infantry forces.
1030.note_zh: The SdKfz 250/7 Mortar Half-track with its 8cm mortar can provide vital battlefield support for infantry forces.

1031.title: Smoke Bombs
1031.note: Large smoke pots are dropped on the battlefield, blocking line of sight.
1031.note_zh: Large smoke pots are dropped on the battlefield, blocking line of sight.

1032.title: Relief Infantry
1032.note: Command releases reserve infantry to replace losses suffered during combat. Forces will be replaced with Ostruppen Infantry.
1032.note_zh: Command releases reserve infantry to replace losses suffered during combat. Forces will be replaced with Ostruppen Infantry.

1033.title: leFH 18 Artillery
1033.note: This light 10.5cm Field Howitzer doesn’t have the destructive power of some Soviet artillery, but it counters with a good rate of fire and reasonably long range.
1033.note_zh: This light 10.5cm Field Howitzer doesn’t have the destructive power of some Soviet artillery, but it counters with a good rate of fire and reasonably long range.

1034.title: Elefant Tank Destroyer
1034.note: Allows the requisition of the Elefant Tank Destroyer to the battlefield.
1034.note_zh: Allows the requisition of the Elefant Tank Destroyer to the battlefield.

1035.title: Light Artillery Barrage
1035.note: A light artillery barrage from nearby 7.5 cm le.IG 18 infantry support guns can scatter enemy forces.
1035.note_zh: A light artillery barrage from nearby 7.5 cm le.IG 18 infantry support guns can scatter enemy forces.

1036.title: Mechanized Grenadier Group
1036.note: Deploys a Grenadier LMG squad in a 250 halftrack to the battlefield.
1036.note_zh: Deploys a Grenadier LMG squad in a 250 halftrack to the battlefield.

1037.title: Spotting Scope
1037.note: Vehicles can be equipped with spotting scopes that allow them to see farther when stationary.
1037.note_zh: Vehicles can be equipped with spotting scopes that allow them to see farther when stationary.

1038.title: Half-track Riegel 43 Anti-Tank Mine
1038.note: Allows the SdKfz 251 to lay Riegel-43 heavy anti-tank mine.
1038.note_zh: Allows the SdKfz 251 to lay Riegel-43 heavy anti-tank mine.

1039.title: Ambush Camouflage
1039.note: Grenadiers, Panzer Grenadiers and HMGs can be upgraded with better camouflage, concealing them in cover or deep snow. Attacking enemy units while in camouflage will briefly increase their damage.
1039.note_zh: Grenadiers, Panzer Grenadiers and HMGs can be upgraded with better camouflage, concealing them in cover or deep snow. Attacking enemy units while in camouflage will briefly increase their damage.

1040.title: Air-Dropped Medical Supplies
1040.note: Paradrop medical supplies at a target area. Heals and inspires nearby units when picked up.
1040.note_zh: Paradrop medical supplies at a target area. Heals and inspires nearby units when picked up.

1041.title: Incendiary Bombing Run
1041.note: A Stuka will drop incendiary bombs on the target location.
1041.note_zh: A Stuka will drop incendiary bombs on the target location.

1042.title: Assault Grenadiers
1042.note: Deploy Assault Grenadiers equipped with MP40 submachineguns and Model 24 grenades.
1042.note_zh: Deploy Assault Grenadiers equipped with MP40 submachineguns and Model 24 grenades.

1043.title: Mechanized Assault Group
1043.note: Deploys a Panzer Grenadier squad in a 250 halftrack to the battlefield.
1043.note_zh: Deploys a Panzer Grenadier squad in a 250 halftrack to the battlefield.

1044.title: StuG III Ausf. E Assault Gun
1044.note: Allows the requisition of the StuG III Ausf. E Assault Gun onto the battlefield.
1044.note_zh: Allows the requisition of the StuG III Ausf. E Assault Gun onto the battlefield.

1045.title: Counterattack Tactics
1045.note: Infantry units are trained to retake territory quickly. Neutral territory is captured more rapidly while active.
1045.note_zh: Infantry units are trained to retake territory quickly. Neutral territory is captured more rapidly while active.

1046.title: Ostruppen Reserves
1046.note: Deploy reserves of Osttruppen previously stationed on the Western Front. These units vary in equipment.
1046.note_zh: Deploy reserves of Osttruppen previously stationed on the Western Front. These units vary in equipment.

1047.title: Sdkfz 234 'Puma' Armored Car
1047.note: Dispatch a Sdkfz 234 'Puma' Armored Car to the battlefield.
1047.note_zh: Dispatch a Sdkfz 234 'Puma' Armored Car to the battlefield.

1048.title: Osttruppen Squad
1048.note: Deploy weak but numerous Osttruppen infantry to the battlefield.
1048.note_zh: Deploy weak but numerous Osttruppen infantry to the battlefield.
